channel.title: I need loads of help
channel.description:
:eek: okay so i just finished downloading maroscape about 3hrs ago and i loved it! it was so cool bein able to be 99 is every skill and bein able to make as many items as u wanted!, and yes i did so...but there was one huge problem, everytime id log out for a break i'd get back and try to log back in into the same account,only this time instead of taking me back to the old account it would completely and totally restart my guy, he would have nothing, so i made 3 more guys! and each 1 of them would be erased after every time i logged out :eek: :confused: soo umm? whats going on, and what do i need to do to fix it???
im new to this game and im in desperate need of help!
so some1 plz help me out as i am so exited to get back logged on not having to worry about it getting erased =)
so if u have any idea what could've happened plz post here what might be wrong and how to fix it
thx ;D

item.title: I need loads of help
item.dc:creator: @andrewdawg andrewdawg
item.description:
@andrewdawg wrote:

lol u are using hybird scape. not the best, so go to server advertisement find a server you like (preferably noip) copy the ip and paste it in : file| new server, then log on with desired username and pass!

Read full topic

item.title: I need loads of help
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

  1. Give up on making your own server until you have some actual in-game experience. Private servers are very different from Runescape.
  2. Go to the “Server Advertisement” section, pick a server, get on it, and stick with it. Lear the bugs, tricks, and codes. THEN, try making your own server. Hopefully after you play for a while, you will realize that you cannot get anywhere playing Hybridscape.

-Alexia | Daineb owns you.

Read full topic
